name: Between Void!
description:
Between Void Is A Simple Game Where You Don't Need To Enter Void.

Note

Playing In Browser And HTML May Not Be Stable, The Game Might Be Very Slow And Boring. Windows Executable Recommended. We Will Try Our Best To Fix It In Future Updates.

Controls

Press Control Button For Starting And Playing The Game. Alt Group Button Will Also Work.
